name: Crazy Racing Dog Simulator
description:
Crazy Racing Dog Simulator is most exciting simulator adventurous game. You enjoy the full speed of dog in this game. In this dog game have an amazing and realistic animal race game and the dream of real celebration to playing dog games. Your dog is performing on race, stunts and high jumps. Test your stunting skills by weaving through challenging obstacles in dog race games.

This animal racing simulator game will definitely win your soul at first vision. . The game provides you to thrilling environment and amazing graphics in this exciting game. You have to play as a favorite dog and perform racing stunts adventures with HD sound of dog barking. . If you really enjoy dog game, racing games and animal’s simulation game; then this is the best simulation game for you.

In this dog race game your race with different animals like hours, tiger. This dog racing game offers you to perform racing jump and stunt like other racing game. Your dog racing with stunt and jump are just about to start. During race make your dog run carefully and not collide with other animals or obstacles.

If you collide with any obstacles or animals then your mission has failed and you can start your mission again. . In quick race mode your goal is chase the rabbit, the dog that chases bunny first win the race. In second tournament mode you will race as like knockout style. . Complete your mission dog has won the race to compete dogs. Earn points to unlock the multiple difficult race tracks and both good trained dogs.

It game will give you a lot of fun. This game provide you beautiful graphics, amazing sled dog textures, realistic physics, breath taking racing animations and action packed gameplay. . It is easy, thrilling and highly addictive game! So go ahead and compete with other awesome canines in gradually harder levels and challenges of dog racing simulator. Install now and enjoy your hours of time with it fun game-play.
